body.name: Simple Trending 3-Tier Stackable Shoe Rack, Expandable & Adjustable Fabric Shoe Shelf Storage Organizer, Black

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 27 mins
features: 【3-TIER SHOE RACK】 Stores up 9-12 pairs of shoes for men, women, additional bottom storage for slippers. Allow extra storage which can hold sundries in your kitchen, living room
【Multifunctional】In the living room, the shelves can hold sundries.Put it in the closet and keep the clothes neat. Make the utility room looks cleaner.

【STACKABLE & EXPANABLE】Include 4 connectors and stack up to multiple units that maximizes storage space in the same footprint, or bridged horizontally to expand the unit (Purchase 2 and more units to build horizontally and vertically storage)

【ADJUSTABLE TIER HEIGH】Easy assembly- Simple clip the shelves into the frame. You can easily adjust the height of shelves accommodates different sizes of shoes. Even the High Boots, you can store it easy
【STURDY & DURABILITY】Made of thickened metal tube with power coated finish which is smooth and with strong corrosion resistance. Simple structure design makes it very easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We love this shoe rack. We bought two and stacked them. Easy to assemble. My husband did it. Nice and sturdy and even. It’s holding 17 pairs of shoes, including his large dress shoes. And it will easily hold four more pair. Definitely recommend this for organizing closets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for our needs.
reviews.reviewText: A great product for the money. Easy to assemble. Description accurate. Fits our closet perfectly and holds 10 pairs of our shoes easily.Sturdy too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well, not easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Picked this up to add shoe storage in the closet. Works great, three levels and flip flops fit under the bottom level if you choose that option.You can actually choose two different locations for both the bottom and top level to give a little more or less space, which is how you can store flip flops under the bottom level.It is not easy to put together by yourself. Since the shelf is fabric and has to be put on before the rods are attached, it becomes difficult. The fabric becomes very tight when you're done, but getting there is the hard part. Once you have one rod screwed in, the second has to be pulled out to line up the screw. Just a little difficult to do by yourself. I assume a third and fourth hand would make it a lot easier. I got it done though.In the end, cheap option for shoe storage in a closet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: It looked complicated to assemble at first, but after studying all the pieces it was not bad. The only hard part was lining up the last screw of each canvas shelf to the post, you really had to pull hard on the canvas to get it lined up in order to center the screw. Although it is lightweight and has canvas shelves, it should be sturdy enough for just holding shoes, can be easily carried and moved.I have it in my entryway to catch all the various every day outdoor shoes, sandals, and crocs which got kicked around on the floor. Looks so much tidier, and is easier to sweep or vacuum around than shoes on the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the money , this is great. It is really light weight and easy to assemble. It is very sturdy when the shoes are on it. It is also modular and you can expand it vertically if needed.Takes about 5 minutes to assemble if you have an electric screw driver/drill. Perhaps 10 minutes otherwise.Great build quality and comes with a couple extra screws just in case you lose one of them.Very well made. Am about to buy another right now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Shoe Rack
reviews.reviewText: I just received the shoe rack today and it fits perfectly in my closet space without taking up a lot of room and I can now have my shoes in one place. I like that if I want to add on to either the top or sideways I can by purchasing another rack. I purchased the black rack and I really like the cloth shelves...they are very sturdy and look nice. They do not sag when shoes are placed on top of them.A couple tips for assembly, since I made a few mistakes and had to take it apart. There are only pictures for instructions and they do not show anything. First, when you snap the end pieces together, make sure the indented sides for the screw heads to fit in are facing out on both end pieces. When assembling, I put all the screws on one side first for the three tiers and tightened them. However, do not tighten them completely until you attach the other side because you will not be able to reach the screws in the holes on the other side unless there is a little looseness on the other end. After all the screws are loosely attached then tighten them all. Although the directions do not show this you will need a Phillips screwdriver to tighten the screws completely; I tried at first to tighten by hand and could not do it.

reviews.reviewerName: nice quality i ordered pink was sent black, you guys should really be on top of the color orders better
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a win!
reviews.reviewText: I have a love/hate relationship with shoe racks. The last ones we bought would break all the time. They were made out of cheap plastic. These ones are connected w metal. So far so good! Perfect for our closets.
Exactly the right width and height for my hallway closet. Keeps our shoes and slippers nicely organized
Su peso es ligero, la relacion calidad-precio es correcta, buen producto, fácil de armar

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen producto fácil de armar, recomendable!
reviews.reviewText: El precio estaba más accesible creo que subió por la demanda, espero que no lo suban más sino consigues el mismo producto en tiendas departamentales y mucho más rápido.
